snippet: The hit on Giants second baseman Marco Scutaro in Game 2 of the N.L.C.S. brought back memories of last season’s collision that sidelined the star catcher Buster Posey.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column maintains that injuries sustained by San Francisco Giants second baseman Marco Scutaro may endanger his team's chances of winning the National League Championship Series.
lead_paragraph: The hit on Giants second baseman Marco Scutaro in Game 2 of the N.L.C.S. brought back memories of last season’s collision that sidelined the star catcher Buster Posey.

headline.seo: An Aggressive Slide Again Bruises the Giants
headline.main: An Aggressive Slide Again Bruises the Giants
headline.print_headline: Giants Again Bruised By an Aggressive Slide
